Package com.espertech.esper.jmx.client

Esper plug-in, endpoint API and configuration.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectorConfig
    Marker interface for a JMX connection configuration.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectorConfigPlatform
    Connector configuration to indicate to use the connector provided by the platform mbean server.
    ConnectorConfigProvided
    Connector configuration to indicate to use the MBeanServer provided herein.
    ConnectorConfigRMIRegistry
    Connector configuration to indicate to use an RMI registry and JMXConnectorServerFactory.
    ConnectorConfigRMIRegistrySecure
    Connector configuration to indicate to use an RMI registry and JMXConnectorServerFactory and security settings.
    EsperJMXPlugin
    A plug-in for loading as part of Esper engine initialization that provides a JMX view onto an engine instance.
    JMXEndpoint
    Provides a JMX view onto an Esper engine instance.
    JMXEndpointConfiguration
    Configuration for the JMX endpoint.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConfigurationException
    Thrown to indicate a configuration problem.

Package com.espertech.esper.jmx.client Description

Esper plug-in, endpoint API and configuration.
